features.name: Authentication System
features.description: Complete authentication system with Supabase integration, user management, and role-based access control

features.name: Document Analysis Engine
features.description: AI-powered document analysis system with multiple AI providers (OpenAI, Anthropic, Google Gemini) and template-based analysis

features.name: Batch Processing System
features.description: Batch document processing with queue management and progress tracking

features.name: Credit System
features.description: Credit-based payment system with Stripe integration and transaction tracking

features.name: Admin Dashboard
features.description: Administrative interface for user management, system configuration, and analytics

features.name: Support System
features.description: Customer support ticket system with messaging and priority management

features.name: Landing Page
features.description: Marketing landing page with features showcase, pricing, and authentication

features.name: Dashboard
features.description: Main user dashboard with analytics, recent analyses, and quick actions

features.name: User Profile Management
features.description: User profile editing and account management

features.name: Document Templates
features.description: Template-based document analysis with predefined legal document types

features.name: Email Service
features.description: Email notification system with SMTP configuration

features.name: Database Schema
features.description: Comprehensive database schema with Drizzle ORM for all application entities

features.name: UI Components
features.description: Reusable UI components built with Radix UI and Tailwind CSS

features.name: File Upload System
features.description: File upload handling with validation and processing

features.name: Legal Compliance
features.description: Legal compliance features including privacy policy, terms of service, and cookie management

features.name: Trash Management
features.description: Soft delete system for document analyses with recovery options

features.name: Contact System
features.description: Contact form and communication system

features.name: Encryption System
features.description: Data encryption and security features

features.name: Storage Management
features.description: File storage and cleanup system

features.name: API Routes
features.description: RESTful API endpoints for all application functionality

features.name: TestSprite Integration
features.description: TestSprite API integration for automated testing
